article_title: Gateway to close six group homes in R.I.
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description:
Citing years of cuts and freezes in Medicaid payments, Gateway Healthcare announced on Monday that budget deficits are forcing it to close six group homes in Rhode Island for people with mental health and substance abuse issues.
About 70 residents, including 55 adults and 15 children and adolescents, will be affected when the homes close at the end of August, according to Gateway. The nonprofit agency, which is part of the Lifespan health system, pledged to either see their treatment to
article_metadata.author: Richard Salit
